section.title: Overview
section.p: At the moment we still only release alpha versions of Schoorbs since many features are rewritten or evaluated if they are secure. With this site we want to present you what our main goals are in the next coming alpha versions.

ul.li: Add a backup/restore function to the Web-Admin-GUI
Rewritten report function with PDF export
Rewritten search interface, results will be flavoured with hCalendar-mircoformat
